name: Latios GX
author: ConceptLab

abilities.name: Power Bind
abilities.effect: If you have 4 or fewer Pokémon in play, this Pokémon can’t attack.

attacks.name: Tag Purge
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from TAG TEAM Pokémon.

attacks.name: Clear Vision GX
attacks.effect: For the rest of this game, your opponent can’t use any GX attacks. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
